getGeometryFieldsCandidates

public java.lang.String[] getGeometryFieldsCandidates(com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.IConnection conn,
                                                      java.lang.String table_name)
                                               throws com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.drivers.DBException
Gets the table's possible geometry fields. By default, all fields can be geometry fields. It should be overwritten by subclasses.

Specified by:
